text: with its abundant marine life and white
sandy beaches the Maldives is many
people's idea of paradise on earth a
group of small Islands dotted around the
warm Waters of the Indian Ocean about
450 km Southwest of Sri Lanka the mes is
home to a community of just 314,000
people the Malian economy evolves around
two main business sectors tourism and
fishing tourism is the main source of
income in the MDES and with average
temperatures of around 29° C that's
about 85° F the holiday season never
ends Malian Society remains firmly
rooted in local traditions and Muslim
faith the major language is Devi
although English is spoken at all hotels
and most shops 30% of maldivians live in
the capital city Mali a bustling
Metropolis with busy markets and shops a
far cry from the Tranquility of local
fishing villages and Resort
Islands but the males are not only
famous for lavish Resorts they are also
one of the world's top destinations for
scuba diving sprawling labyrinths of
coral reefs team with a myriad marine
species for many the highlight of their
trip is an encounter with whale sharks
and mantis the gentle giant of the ocean
seaf Fairing and exploration are part of
the country's DNA so it comes as little
surprise that libard cruises are a big
attraction in the malds the sense of
adventure freedom and pure relaxation
found aboard such cruises is unique
anchoring at a different Lagoon every
day and having access to the country's
top dive sites offers a brilliant
holiday experience spending a week or
more Cruis around the atolls is the best
way to get to know the country a holiday
in the males will leave you convinced
that paradise truly is a place on Earth
for the best prices on your next Mal's
dream holiday please visit
maldivesdivetravel
tocom and take advantage of our best
